short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clipy makes it easy to keep everything you want to copy and paste all in one extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Clipy makes your life easier by managing text strings that you use daily. Simply add the text you want to store later and click it to copy to your clipboard.

Clipy v1.5.0 Update:
Clipy now supports storing, copying, and pasting of images!
Demo of v1.5.0: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Qqrt_1BZHW4
